title: Handkerchief, 1900–50
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: padded satin, stem and speckling stitches with areas of deflected element work on a plain weave foundation
description: Handkerchief with a pattern of curving scrolls, floral sprays and bars of openwork.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1900–50.
1900–50. Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: padded satin, stem and speckling stitches with areas of deflected element work on a plain weave foundation. Gift of Stanley Herzman. 1976-92-4.
